trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> private key of the `<KeyInfo>` element.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class represents the `<KeyInfo>` element, which contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> public key.

Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> to identify the public key that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> private key that was used to create the digital signature.
If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key pair is randomly generated.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class is used with XML signatures.
For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> class with a new, randomly-generated <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> public key.

When creating a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key, this constructor uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> as defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> public key.
The instance of an implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> class that holds the public key.
Returns the XML representation of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> element.
Use this method to output XML for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> element.
Gets or sets the key value represented by a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> object.
This property represents the DSA key used to sign the XML.
The public key represented by a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> object.
Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> state from an XML element.
This method can be used to add XML elements to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
The XML element to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> state from.
The value parameter is `null`.
The value parameter is not a valid XML element.
